Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 8 wickets with 43 balls remaining.
Lockie Ferguson was named Player of the Match for his 3/49.
Trent Boult was Cricinfo's MVP with 96.21 points.
Mushfiqur Rahim scored 66 off 75 balls for Bangladesh.
Shakib Al Hasan scored 40 off 51 balls for Bangladesh.
Mahmudullah remained not out with 41 off 49 balls for Bangladesh.
Daryl Mitchell scored an unbeaten 89 off 67 balls for New Zealand.
Kane Williamson scored 78 off 107 balls before retiring hurt.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand won the toss and elected to field first.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chepauk, Chennai.
New Zealand earned 2 points from the match, while Bangladesh earned 0 points.
